title: My emotionally abusive ex has just got engaged... but he insists I'm 'the one'. Should we try again?
text:
Dear A&E,

I was with my ex from the age of 21 to 31. He was funny, interesting and exciting, but he would frequently put me down and questioned all of my decisions. Four years ago, I walked out. I’m now in a relationship with a kind, gentle man and recently my ex got engaged – he phoned to tell me, saying his fiancée will only ever be second best to me. I still feel he is the love of my life. But I also know how sad I often was when we were together and I’m terrified of feeling that way again.

Dear Confused,
